description:
Developing new features for different apps within the company by applying:
• UIKit
• SwiftUI
• MVVM Pattern
• UI Tests and Unit Tests
• Accessibility features (mainly Voice Over)
• Fastlane
• Firebase
• Firebase Crashlytics
• Postman
• Proxyman
• SCRUM Environment

Participated in an iOS Bootcamp using:
•UIKit
•SwiftUI
•MVVM
•Unit Tests

Reason for leaving: relocation to Germany

Experiences:
• Creative process and game concept development
• Game development, art assets creation, programming assisting (Corona SDK)
• Creating marketing strategies for game
• Influencer Marketing Campaigns for games
• Data and Metrics Analyst (Google Analytic and Flurry)
• 10+ mobile games released (Google Play and App Store)
• Three games with more than 100k downloads, and one of them reached over 1M installs

Published Games:
• Ja Acabou Jessica?
• Enem de Memes
• Lipao Game
• Menino do Acre
• Ultra Jump
• Mega Punch
• Enem de Gênios
• Marilene não se mete
• MatMat
• DiCaprio Oscar Revenge
• Pixevolution
• Mr Mine

Highlights:
• Over 1.5Mi downloads in total on Google Play and App Store
• Appearance on the main Brazilian newsletters: G1, O Globo, Exame, Tecmundo, TechTudo, SuperInteressante, Terra, O Povo, Estadão, and many more.
• Game appearance on big Youtube channels
Game development focused on children's games using Unity. To create the images, I used Photoshop and Final Cut Pro to edit small demo videos.
